author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silversun Technologies Reports Q1 Shr $0.01
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - SilverSun Technologies Inc:
* SILVERSUN TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS PROFITABLE FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q1 REVENUE ROSE 16.3 PERCENT TO $9.31 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
